source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  [CompanyCR]
      ,[ITEMCODE]
      ,[BARCODE]
      ,[PRODUCTNAMEARABIC]
      ,[DESCRIPTIONARABIC]
      ,[PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH]
      ,[DESCRIPTIONENGLISH]
      ,[UNITITEMBARCODE]
      ,[NOOFUNITITEMS]
      ,[UNITWEIGHTSIZE]
      ,[UNITUOM]
      ,[PACKAGEUOM]
      ,[COSTPRICE]
      ,[SELLINGPRICE]
      ,[BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH]
      ,[BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC]
      ,CASE
WHEN CHARINDEX(
'???',
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[0]') AS varchar(500))
) > 0 THEN
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[1]') AS varchar(500))
ELSE
CAST(JSON_VALUE(CONCAT('["', REPLACE(MOCIPRODUCTGROUP, ' - ', '","'), '"]'), '$[0]') AS varchar(500))
END [MOCIPRODUCTGROUP]
      ,[COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME]
      ,[COUNTRYOFORAGENISO]
      ,[HSCODE]
      ,[SUPPLIERCR]
      ,[SUPPLIERNAME]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL11]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL12]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL13]
      ,[CATEGORYLEVEL14]
      ,[WIDTH]
      ,[HEIGHT]
      ,[DEPTH]
      ,[ID_SK]
      ,[DS_FILENAME]
      ,[DT_FILETIME]
      ,[DT_CREATE]
      ,[DT_UPDATE]
  FROM [dwh].[STG_PRODUCTS_VALID]

parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date -   } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code -   } as string,
		{Item Code -  } as string,
		{Item Barcode -  } as string,
		{Your Company CR# -    } as string,
		{Other Entity CR# -     } as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code -   } as string,
		{Quantity - } as string,
		{Selling Price per unit -     -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -    } as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code -   } as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices -    } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingCsv
processingCsv derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date -   },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY = TRANSACTION_DATE,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE = {Transaction Type Code -   },
		ID_ITEM_CODE = {Item Code -  },
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode -  },
		ID_ENTITY_CR = {Your Company CR# -    },
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# -     },
		ID_COMPANY_STORE_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code -   },
		MT_QUANTITY = {Quantity - },
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = {Selling Price per unit -     -},
		ID_COMMON_REF_CODE = {Comon Referance No. -    },
		ID_TRANSFER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code -   },
		ID_INVOICE_NUMBER = {Number of Consumer Invoices -    },
		SK_ID = SK_ID_SUR,
		STG_FILENAME,
		STG_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions
